text: Maybe you need to get away from the screen for a bit?
credits: Image: IWDRM, from the movie Sneakers.

text: Sometimes all you need is a breeze of fresh air...
credits: Image: TECH NOIR, from the movie Submarine.

title: Don't stop!
text: Just pause for a second and breath...
credits: Image: TECH NOIR, from the movie Byzantium.

text: Replace fear of the unknown with curiosity.
Yesterday is history; tomorrow is a mystery. Today is a gift, which is why we call it the present.
I have just three things to teach: simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures.
In character, in manner, in style, in all things, the supreme excellence is simplicity.
If we don't discipline ourselves, the world will do it for us.
Rule your mind or it will rule you.
credits: Image: IWDRM, from the movie Eraserhead.

text: All that we are is the result of what we have thought.
Doing just a little bit during the time we have available puts you that much further ahead than if you took no action at all.
Never leave that till tomorrow which you can do today.
Procrastination is like a credit card: it's a lot of fun until you get the bill.
credits: Image: IWDRM, from the movie The Truman Show.

text: Someday is not a day of the week.
Tomorrow is often the busiest day of the week.
I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying.
There’s a myth that time is money. In fact, time is more precious than money. It’s a nonrenewable resource. Once you’ve spent it, and if you’ve spent it badly, it’s gone forever.
Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal; nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.
There is only one success, to be able to spend your life in your own way.
credits: Image: TECH NOIR, from the movie Submarine.

text: Success is the good fortune that comes from aspiration, desperation, perspiration and inspiration.
We are still masters of our fate. We are still captains of our souls.
Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake.
The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
Life without endeavor is like entering a jewel mine and coming out with empty hands.
Happiness does not consist in pastimes and amusements but in virtuous activities.
By constant self-discipline and self-control, you can develop greatness of character.
The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
At the end of the day, let there be no excuses, no explanations, no regrets.
Inaction will cause a man to sink into the slough of despond and vanish without a trace.
True freedom is impossible without a mind made free by discipline.
The most powerful control we can ever attain, is to be in control of ourselves.
Idleness is only the refuge of weak minds, and the holiday of fools.
credits: Image: From the movie Lost In Translation.

text: This is your life and it's ending one minute at a time.
credits: Image: From the movie Fight Club.

text: You create opportunities by performing, not complaining.
Great achievement is usually born of great sacrifice, and is never the result of selfishness.
Whether you think you can, or you think you can't, you're right.
Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage.
If you hear a voice within you say “you cannot paint,” then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced.
Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
Fall seven times and stand up eight.
Wherever you go, there you are.
Being vulnerable is the only way to allow your heart to feel true pleasure.
